revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: A system of moral philosophy, in three books; written by the late Francis Hutcheson, L. L. D. Professor of Philosophy in the University of Glasgow. Published from..."
revision.text: Possibly: A system of moral philosophy, in three books; written by the late Francis Hutcheson, L. L. D. Professor of Philosophy in the University of Glasgow. Published from the Original Manuscript, by his Son Francis Hutcheson, M. D. To which is prefixed some account of the life, writings, and character of the author, by the Reverend William Leechman, D. D. Professor of Divinity in the Same University. 2v. (Glasgow : Printed and sold by R. and A. Foulis printers to the University. London, sold by A. Millar over-against Katharine Street in the Strand, and by T. Longman in Pater-Noster Row, MDCCLV [1755]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2510491~S1
